Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.name: image
Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.abstract: Relative path of the image file if uploaded directly. Not returned when the image is passed by URL.

Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.name: sourceURL
Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.abstract: Source of the image before any redirects. Not returned when the image is uploaded.

Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.name: resolvedURL
Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.abstract: Fully resolved URL of the image after redirects are followed. Not returned when the image is uploaded.

Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.name: error
Structs/ImageWithFaces.html#/s:19VisualR.abstract: Information about what might have caused a failure, such as an image that is too large. Not returned when there is

Structs/FaceLocation.html#/s:19VisualRec.name: left
Structs/FaceLocation.html#/s:19VisualRec.abstract: X-position of top-left pixel of face region.

Structs/FaceLocation.html#/s:19VisualRec.name: top
Structs/FaceLocation.html#/s:19VisualRec.abstract: Y-position of top-left pixel of face region.

Structs/FaceGender.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: gender
Structs/FaceGender.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Gender identified by the face. For example, MALE or FEMALE.

Structs/FaceGender.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: genderLabel
Structs/FaceGender.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: The word for male or female in the language defined by the Accept-Language request header.

Structs/FaceGender.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: score

Structs/FaceAge.html#/s:19VisualRecognit.abstract: Confidence score in the range of 0 to 1. A higher score indicates greater confidence in the estimated value for the

Structs/Face.html#/s:19VisualRecognition.name: gender
Structs/Face.html#/s:19VisualRecognition.abstract: Information about the gender of the face.

Structs/Face.html#/s:19VisualRecognition.name: faceLocation
Structs/Face.html#/s:19VisualRecognition.abstract: The location of the bounding box around the face.

Structs/ErrorInfo.html#/s:19VisualRecogn.name: description
Structs/ErrorInfo.html#/s:19VisualRecogn.abstract: Human-readable error description. For example, File size limit exceeded.

Structs/DetectedFaces.html#/s:19VisualRe.name: imagesProcessed

Structs/DetectedFaces.html#/s:19VisualRe.name: warnings

Structs/ClassifierResult.html#/s:19Visua.name: classifierID

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: classifierID
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: ID of a classifier identified in the image.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: owner
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Unique ID of the account who owns the classifier. Might not be returned by some requests.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: coreMLEnabled
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Whether the classifier can be downloaded as a Core ML model after the training status is ready.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: explanation
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: If classifier training has failed, this field might explain why.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: created
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Date and time in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that the classifier was created.

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: retrained

Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.name: updated
Structs/Classifier.html#/s:19VisualRecog.abstract: Date and time in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) that the classifier was most recently updated. The field matches

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.name: serviceURL
Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: The base URL to use when contacting the service.

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.name: defaultHeaders
Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: The default HTTP headers for all requests to the service.

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.name: getCoreMLModel(classifierID:headers:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: Retrieve a Core ML model of a classifier.

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.name: getLocalModel(classifierID:)
Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: Retrieve a Core ML model from the local filesystem.

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.name: updateLocalModel(classifierID:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: Download the latest Core ML model to the local filesystem, unless the latest version

Classes/VisualRecognition.html#/s:19Visu.abstract: Classify an image using a Core ML model from the local filesystem.

Classes/VisualRecognition.html.name: VisualRecognition
Classes/VisualRecognition.html.abstract: The IBM Watson™ Visual Recognition service uses deep learning algorithms to identify scenes, objects, and faces
